ayurvedic_facial_services.title: Ayurvedic Glow Facial
ayurvedic_facial_services.view_details: Uses herbal oils and Ubtan for a radiant glow
ayurvedic_facial_services.description: A rejuvenating facial that revives dull skin using natural Ayurvedic herbs like turmeric and sandalwood.

ayurvedic_facial_services.title: Neem & Tulsi Purifying Facial
ayurvedic_facial_services.view_details: Ideal for acne-prone and oily skin
ayurvedic_facial_services.description: Detoxifies skin and prevents breakouts with the anti-bacterial power of neem and tulsi extracts.

ayurvedic_facial_services.title: Kumkumadi Radiance Facial
ayurvedic_facial_services.description: Premium Ayurvedic facial with saffron-infused oil that enhances glow, reduces pigmentation, and rejuvenates tired skin.

ayurvedic_facial_services.title: Sandalwood Cooling Facial
ayurvedic_facial_services.view_details: Soothing treatment for sensitive and irritated skin
ayurvedic_facial_services.description: Calms inflammation and redness using pure sandalwood paste and herbal tonics.

ayurvedic_facial_services.title: Multani Mitti Detox Facial
ayurvedic_facial_services.view_details: Deep cleansing with Fuller’s Earth and rosewater
ayurvedic_facial_services.description: Removes impurities, tightens pores, and leaves skin soft and matte. Best for oily and combination skin.
